translation.explanation: An organization where people work to earn money. A corporate entity engaged in commercial activities.

examples.beginner: I do company at work.
examples.advanced: Company is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in company is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: A room or space where office work is done. The place where you work in a company.

examples.beginner: I do office at work.
examples.advanced: Office is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in office is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: When multiple people gather to share opinions. A gathering to discuss work matters.

examples.beginner: I do meeting at work.
examples.advanced: Meeting is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in meeting is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: A person with a higher position than you at work. Manager, team leader, director, etc.

examples.beginner: I do boss / superior at work.
examples.advanced: Boss / Superior is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in boss / superior is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: A person you work with at the same workplace. An employee in the same team or department.

examples.beginner: I do colleague / coworker at work.
examples.advanced: Colleague / Coworker is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in colleague / coworker is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: Work that needs to be handled. Jobs or responsibilities at the workplace.

examples.beginner: I do work / task / duty at work.
examples.intermediate: Work / Task / Duty is my job.
examples.advanced: Work / Task / Duty is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in work / task / duty is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: A letter sent and received over the internet. Electronic mail.

examples.beginner: I do email at work.
examples.advanced: Email is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in email is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: A communication device for voice conversation. Talk to someone far away through a telephone.

examples.beginner: I do phone / call at work.
examples.advanced: Phone / Call is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in phone / call is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: A document organizing research or study results. A written summary of work results to be submitted.

examples.beginner: I do report at work.
examples.advanced: Report is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in report is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: The time limit by which work must be completed. Submission deadline or completion time limit.

examples.beginner: I do deadline at work.
examples.advanced: Deadline is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in deadline is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: Salary received over one year. Total annual wages.

examples.beginner: I do annual salary at work.
examples.advanced: Annual salary is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in annual salary is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: Salary received once a month. Wages paid every month.

examples.beginner: I do monthly salary at work.
examples.advanced: Monthly salary is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in monthly salary is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: Going to the workplace. Arriving at the company in the morning.

examples.beginner: I do going to work at work.
examples.intermediate: Going to work is my job.
examples.advanced: Going to work is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in going to work is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: Finishing work and going home. Leaving the company.

examples.beginner: I do getting off work at work.
examples.intermediate: Getting off work is my job.
examples.advanced: Getting off work is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in getting off work is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: Working until late at night. Working after regular hours.

examples.beginner: I do overtime / working late at work.
examples.intermediate: Overtime / Working late is my job.
examples.advanced: Overtime / Working late is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in overtime / working late is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: A period of rest from work. Days off allowed by the company.

examples.beginner: I do vacation / leave at work.
examples.advanced: Vacation / Leave is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in vacation / leave is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: Meeting in person to answer questions. Being interviewed by a company when job hunting.

examples.advanced: Interview is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in interview is key to career advancement.

translation.explanation: A document listing your experience and education. Submitted when job hunting.

examples.beginner: I do resume / cv at work.
examples.advanced: Resume / CV is an essential skill in work life.
examples.master: Developing expertise in resume / cv is key to career advancement.

examples.master: Developing expertise in presentation is key to career advancement.
